long_description: With a ruched fabric along the front and back to add a distinctive look, the MPG Strive Gym Shorts for women keep up with a fit lifestyle thanks to their performance fabric and a comfortable liner. 4-way stretch fabric in outer shorts and liner wicks moisture and dries quickly to keep you comfortable during exercise; perforated side fabric panels enhance breathability. The women's MPG Strive Gym Shorts for women offer a mid rise. Hidden inner pocket for a key; reflective rear ruching; high visibility logo.
short_description: With a ruched fabric along the front and back to add a distinctive look, the MPG Strive Gym Shorts for women keep up with a fit lifestyle thanks to their performance fabric and a comfortable liner.
